name: Rise UP!
description:
Action-adventure game experience

Rise UP! - it's a 3D Action-adventure game, where you have to explore a mysterious dungeon. 

Try to survive fighting dangerous monsters in every possible way. 

Complete the task with the search for spheres to ascend to a new level. 

Use the environment and magic as a way to overcome obstacles. 

Complete levels for a while, and turned into a real Rise Up veteran.

Features
  • Experience a dungeon-crawler game where every room is full of monsters and traps.
  • Run along the walls, slide, climb do whatever it takes to get to the end
  • Use environment to fight back
  • Fully destructible objects
  • Secret rooms, riddles and traps
  • Use potions to survive
  • Look for enchanted books to enhance your magic
  • Look for keys to open special doors
Controls

WARNING: This game is still in development! It still has a problem with sounds, music, and optimization but we working on it!
